Semester 1: State Core Gen Ed Composition; Writing Requirement (3 credits)
Semester 3: State Core Gen Ed Biological Sciences (3 credits)
State Core Gen Ed Social and Behavioral Sciences (3 credits)
Semester 5: Quest 2 (Gen Ed Biological or Social and Behavioral Science) (3 credits)
Semester 6: Gen Ed Social and Behavioral Sciences (3 credits)
Semester 9: Gen Ed Biological Sciences OR Gen Ed Social and Behavioral Sciences (Area not taken as Quest 2 in Semester 4) (3 credits)
Foreign language course (or elective if 4-3-3 option) (3 credits)
